com.elsevier.xml

Class NamespaceContextMappings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elsevier.xml.NamespaceContextMappings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext

    public class NamespaceContextMappings
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext
    Class which provides the ability to 'register' namespace prefix to namespace uri mappings. This is necessary for the XPath/XQuery expression evaluation when the xpath/xquery expression contains namespace prefixes. If the xpath/xquery expression does not contain namespace prefixes, then there is no need to register any mappings. Default mappings are provided for the well-known namespace prefixes 'xml', 'fn', and 'xs'.
    Author:
    Darin McBeath

      • getNamespaceURI

        public java.lang.String getNamespaceURI(java.lang.String prefix)
        Provide namespace prefix to namespace uri resolution capability. All of the namespace prefixed declared in XPath Expressions should be mapped to the correct URI (in the XML) otherwise the evaluation will not be correct.
        Specified by:
